summary.description:
Today, cooler for the outside temperature (down 2.5°C) and feels like temperature (down 2.2°C) and more moisture-laden outside humidity (up 8%).

Compared to today, yesterday also had noticeable differences in cloud levels (up 628 m).

The past week and month had observable variation in cloud levels (up 1578 m), light levels (up 3529 lux), feels like temperature (up 4.3°C), and outside temperature (up 4.2°C) when compared to today.

cloud levels.description:
Today’s average cloud levels is 628.1m lower than yesterday, 534.1m lower than the past week, 1578.4m lower than the past month.

Yesterday, the cloud levels ranged from a minimum of 1059m to a maximum of 3380m, averaging 1096.2m; the past week and month had slightly higher averages of 1630.2m and 2670m respectively.
cloud levels.summary: Cloud cover will be variable, overcast at times.

summary.summary: Inside; temperatures should be quite comfortable. Outside; the temperature will feel pleasantly warm. Also, oppressively muggy and sticky and winds will be practically absent. Possible light showers, cloud cover will be variable, overcast at times, and bright intervals likely. Low pressure may bring unsettled weather.
